thread.title: Swansea City boss Garry Monk tips Ghana star Andre Ayew to fire against Stoke City
thread.title_full: Swansea City boss Garry Monk tips Ghana star Andre Ayew to fire against Stoke City

title: Swansea City boss Garry Monk tips Ghana star Andre Ayew to fire against Stoke City
text:
Sports News | 18 October 2015 00:55 CET Swansea City boss Garry Monk tips Ghana star Andre Ayew to fire against Stoke City - www.ghanasoccernet.com Swansea Cityâ€™s Andre Ayew 
Swansea City boss Garry Monk insists his wide boy Andre Ayew is ready to fire against Stoke City despite concerns over his fitness and fatigue. 
The Ghana deputy captain missed the Black Stars friendly against Canada this week with the excuse that he was suffered a minor knee injury. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
